title: What font is this?
content:
Hi guys,

I have a question, do you guys know what font this is?  
I have already searched for a couple of hours but I cant find the name.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108015617im_/http:/typophile.com/files/test-font_3514.jpg)
author: hans12442

comments.content: Very close to [Laudiatio Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108015617/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/laudatio-pro/bold-cnd/) - the /g is different.
yes I know, cant find the original font family.
